pr_title: [#10176] Fix section-related problems in session results page

timeline.bodyText:
When I write the refactored version, I have considered the case for DEFAULT_SECTION.  To me, it looks like adding support for No specific section does not need to modify the backend. What happened if we do not modify the logic?
Actually, DEFAULT_SECTION does not mean it comes from Instructors. V6 actually allows default section for students if section is not provided (P.S. the behavior need to be changed in V6).
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: Looks like you're right. For some reason I didn't manage to get it work before.
replies.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: The logic should be in getRecipientSection? and we don't need to check intent?
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: SELF being mapped to Const.DEFAULT_SECTION is not right for student giver type.
replies.author: wkurniawan07

replies.bodyText: I mean we should put the logic inside getRecipientSection :P
replies.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: Intent is necessary to sieve out student-instructors.
replies.author: wkurniawan07

replies.bodyText:
Actually if we don't remove the check for intent, the case you mention will cause exactly the problem you have fixed.
For student-instructor path, the recipient section should be 'None' rather than student's section.
replies.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: I meant it's to sieve out students and instructors for entities that are both. Student-instructor feedback path is common and doesn't belong here.
replies.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText:
So Yup, I am proposing new solution here.
By right, when the recipientType is SELF, we should examine the giverType instead. If we didn't do this, it will work if an account is either student or instructor but will generate wrong section when the account is both student and instructor.
The fix will not only cover your if check but will also fix other problems (self (the self is feedback creator (instructor)) -> self, team -> self) (P.S. look like we found some bugs).
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.message: Fix display logic for instructor questions
Fix logic for determining recipient section
